alert.note: Alert for Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 30 at 3:10PM EDT until October 31 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EDT TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 10 inches in the most persistent band. * WHERE...Northern Houghton County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Visibility could be near zero in the heaviest snow band. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall amounts will vary considerably based on the location of the most persistent snow band. Snowfall rates of one to two inches per hour are expected within the heaviest snow band. Highest totals are expected along and west of the US-41 corridor north of Painesdale.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
